changeSet.author: nahuel
changeSet.comment: Create file_metadata_cvterm: cvterms to formally describe an image or file
changeSet.sql: create table file_metadata_cvterm ( file_metadata_id int null, cvterm_id int null, constraint pk_file_metadata_cvterm primary key (file_metadata_id, cvterm_id), constraint fk_file_metadata_cvterm_cvterm_cvterm_id foreign key (cvterm_id) references cvterm (cvterm_id), constraint fk_file_metadata_cvterm_file_metadata_file_id foreign key (file_metadata_id) references file_metadata (file_id) ) comment 'cvterms to formally describe an image or file';
